description: A S.W.A.T. team becomes trapped in a tenement run by a ruthless mobster and his army of killers and thugs.
title: The Raid: Redemption

description: Only a short time after the first raid, Rama goes undercover with the thugs of Jakarta and plans to bring down the syndicate and uncover the corruption within his police force.
title: The Raid 2

description: Ito, a gangland enforcer, is caught amidst a treacherous and violent insurrection within his Triad crime family upon his return home from a stint abroad.
stars: Joe Taslim,Iko Uwais,Julie Estelle,Hannah Al Rashid
title: The Night Comes for Us

description: Bahri, a young man who lives in Mekarsari Village. One day, Bahri realized that something was wrong in Mekarsari Village. Out of curiosity, he also found out what was really going on in the village where he lived.
stars: Monty Tiwa,Ajil Ditto,Givina Lukita,Alif Joerg,Unique Priscilla
title: Hidayah

description: Suzzanna was bewitched on a Kliwon Friday night. She came back for revenge, in the form of Sundel Bolong.
title: Suzzanna: Malam Jumat Kliwon

description: After dying from a strange illness that she suffered for 3 years, a mother returns home to pick up her children.
title: Satan's Slaves

description: The lives of Narendra and Ajeng intersect for the first time as past and present come together in this prequel to "One Day We'll Talk About Today."
title: Today We'll Talk About That Day

description: When the heavy storm hits, it wasn't the storm that a family should fear but the people and non-human entities who are out for them.
title: Satan's Slaves 2: Communion

description: A toll booth operator travels to her ancestral village in hopes of claiming an inheritance - until she discovers the unsettling truth about her past.
title: Impetigore

description: Tells the story of an elite assassin that is targeted by murderous gangsters after sparing a girl's life during a massacre.
title: The Big 4

description: A full peek to a day in the life of Jonny and Franky, two best friends who got cornered into doing three missions out of their work principle and value, in order to retire from their job as hitmen.
stars: Kemal Al Giffari,Bagus Iman,Vino G. Bastian,Abdur Arsyad,Brisia Jodie,Anggika Bolsterli
title: Hitmen

description: Ambar and his family were terrorized when they celebrated Lebaran in the Bandung area. Ambar, a beautiful young woman who has limited vision, is able to see things that other people can't see.
title: Ivanna

description: In a village there is a girl who says goodbye to the mosque to pray maghrib to her father.
stars: Nafiza Fatia Rani,Ali Fikry,Bima Sena,Aulia Sarah
title: Waktu Maghrib

description: Uwais plays a young man who washes ashore, an amnesiac with a serious head injury whose past comes back to haunt him shortly after being nursed back to health by a young doctor. Violence ensues. Sweet, sweet violence.
stars: Timo Tjahjanto,Iko Uwais,Chelsea Islan,Sunny Pang,Very Tri Yulisman
title: Headshot

description: A teenager with the uncanny ability to communicate with the dead must stop a vengeful demon who's exacting revenge on students at his high school.
title: Tainted Soul

description: Seeking shelter in a forgotten part of town, travelers get trapped inside a cursed motel - while its host forces them to face its darkest terrors.
stars: Billy Christian,Alexandra Gottardo,Kiki Narendra,Samuel Panjaitan,Fandy Christian
title: Motel Melati

description: When her estranged father falls into a mysterious coma, a young woman seeks answers at his old villa, where she and her stepsister uncover dark truths.
title: May the Devil Take You

description: The families of two people are terrorized by black magic attacks. To protect their loved ones, they go after the culprit behind the mystical events.
title: Blood Curse

description: Dita, a graphic designer torn between the holographic presence of her deceased love Ed and her current relationship with Ifan, must choose between the past and the present.
title: Ketika Berhenti di Sini

description: Villagers around the Kahuripan Islamic Boarding School experienced many disturbances, from crop failure to possession. What happened?
stars: Imron Ayikayu,Vino G. Bastian,Marsha Timothy,Maudy Effrosina,Randy Pangalila
title: Qodrat

description: A young man from the countryside uses his skills in silat martial arts to survive the slave trade.
title: Merantau

description: Revisiting the orphanage where they grew up, three men and their families discover a horrific supernatural presence lingering in their former home.
stars: Ario Bayu,Hannah Al Rashid,Adhisty Zara,Muzakki Ramdhan
title: The Queen of Black Magic

description: Motel Melati was originally an old Dutch colonial estate which was converted into an inn. The house was once owned by a local doctor named Kusno, who secretly performed inhumane experiments...
title: Losmen Melati

description: Indonesian teen drama based on the American TV series 'Pretty Little Liars', centering on the lives of four female students whose clique falls apart when their leader goes mysteriously missing.
title: Pretty Little Liars

description: A straight-A high schooler's life is turned upside down when her risqué fantasy blog about her crush is leaked to everyone at school.
stars: Shenina Cinnamon,Emir Mahira,Caitlin North Lewis,Maya Hasan
title: Dear David

description: Two newly weds Adjie and Astrid, along with 3 of their best friends decided to have an interstate road trip as a last attempt to reconcile Adjie with his estranged little sister Ladya. ...
stars: Timo Tjahjanto,Shareefa Daanish,Julie Estelle,Ario Bayu,Sigi Wimala
title: Macabre

description: Seven friends who attend a dinner and decide to play a game with their cell phones which culminate in disaster when their dark secret is revealed.
stars: Vino G. Bastian,Adipati Dolken,Jessica Mila,Denny Sumargo
title: Perfect Strangers

description: After a pregnant woman is murdered, her spirit seeks revenge against her increasingly terrified killers, who are determined to finish her off for good.
stars: Anggy Umbara,Luna Maya,Herjunot Ali,T. Rifnu Wikana,Verdi Solaiman
title: Suzzanna: Buried Alive

description: Sri is tasked to do a cleansing ritual for Dela Atmojo, an unconscious girl who is suffering from 1000 days-hex. The terror begins when her friend neglects to finish the ritual. Failing until the 1000th day will result in their demise.
title: Sewu Dino

description: Nana, a gentle, beautiful young woman, escapes a violent anti-communist purge. Afterwards she lives comfortably as the second wife of a rich Sundanese man but her past re-emerges in her dreams.
stars: Happy Salma,Laura Basuki,Arswendy Bening Swara,Ibnu Jamil
title: Before, Now & Then

description: 4 people intend to commit suicide together by blowing themselves up using a large ball of fireworks.
title: Fireworks

description: Cahya gets a job as a maid working in an isolated old mansion. Pregnant and a recent widow, she is desperate to reconnect with her husband, opening a doorway to the spirit world. And in ...
title: Sleeping Beauties

description: The life of a successful sculptor is turned upside down when he begins receiving mysterious messages from someone who asks for his help.
title: The Forbidden Door

description: Alina Suhita's unwavering determination is tested as she navigates the storms of her tumultuous marriage in pursuit of love.
title: Hati Suhita

description: Two years after escaping from demonic terror, the young woman is still haunted by unnatural vision. The dangers that await her and her friends are increasingly threatening: the figure of darkness rises to take their lives.
stars: Chelsea Islan,Widika Darsih Sidmore,Baskara Mahendra,Hadijah Shahab
title: May the Devil Take You Too

description: A young man working as a housekeeper in an empty mansion. When its owner returns to start his mayoral election campaign, the young man bonds with him and defends him when his campaign is vandalized, setting off a chain of violence.
stars: Kevin Ardilova,Arswendy Bening Swara,Haru Sandra,Rukman Rosadi
title: Autobiography

description: The legend of Yamashita's Gold lures a treasure hunter and his group deep into the Indonesian jungle. Once they are trapped in an abandoned World War II Japanese bunker, they face the terrifying reality that the only way out is to go further in.
title: Dead Mine

description: Boy, a perfect student, faces heartbreak and confusion when his beloved girlfriend disappears, leading to a new romance that is threatened by the return of his ex-girlfriend.
title: Catatan Si Boy

description: A psychopathic Japanese executive accidentally triggers a journalist's 'dark side'. They begin to connect over the Internet and make a complicated bond.
stars: Timo Tjahjanto,Kazuki Kitamura,Oka Antara,Rin Takanashi,Luna Maya
title: Killers

description: Amidst a mountain climbing trip, Rana goes missing, but miraculously returns home, causing a conflict between her mother's belief in her survival and the superstitious extended family.
title: Primbon

description: Life at a boarding school descends into chaos when a teacher instructs his students to perform a forbidden ritual that summons their doppelgängers.
title: Qorin

description: Three siblings live in happy-looking families, but one of them changes and gets warned by his parents, prompting the rebellion of the three siblings which led to the discovery of the secrets and great trauma in their families.
stars: Rio Dewanto,Sheila Dara Aisha,Rachel Amanda,Sinyo Riza
title: One Day We'll Talk About Today

description: After losing her scholarship when photos of her at a party surface online, a student pairs with a photocopy worker to piece together what happened.
title: Photocopier

description: When a rogue regime threatens Indonesia's food supply in a bid for power, a former marine assembles a team of ex-comrades to end the hostile takeover.
title: Foxtrot Six

description: Anton's marriage to Yuni, his wife's friend, triggers a series of supernatural terrors and conflicts, leaving Nuri disappointed and Yuni's mother fearing for the safety of her child and future grandchildren.
title: Sosok Ketiga

description: Two sisters find themselves haunted by an evil spirit.
stars: Revalina S. Temat,Ringgo Agus Rahman,Henidar Amroe,Agung Basuki
title: Pocong 2

description: A bankrupt schemer tries to get his hands on a wealthy widow's money but the daughter intervenes. Meanwhile, a mysterious killer is running amok.
title: Permainan Binal

description: A dying widower gathers his kids to decide who will receive his inheritance. Past secrets are revealed until one is chosen to inherit everything.
stars: Oka Antara,Indah Permatasari,Ge Pamungkas,Yayu A.W. Unru
title: Gara-Gara Warisan

description: Due to the economic crisis he experienced, Jaka Sunarya was forced to sell the family haired house he had left 20 years ago. The house is not well maintained and is located deep in the interior of the village.
title: Pamali
